questions: Is MONITORED SCENARIO a similar scenario compared with EXISTING TEST CASES?
Will FUNCTION CANDIDATE work differently when executing under MONITORED SCENARIO?
Will FUNCTION CANDIDATE raise any runtime error or exception when executing under MONITORED SCENARIO?
Does FUNCTION CANDIDATE still produce correct results when executing under MONITORED SCENARIO?
Will MONITORED SCENARIO reveal any bug in FUNCTION CANDIDATE? If YES, which line of code is buggy?
task: Given a FUNCTION CANDIDATE and a MONITORED SCENARIO, you should answer all questions in QUESTIONS. For each question, you should answer with YES or NO and give a reasonable explanation. Put only YES or NO between [ANSWER] and [/ANSWER] tags. Explanation must be between [EXPLANATION] and [/EXPLANATION] tags. Put the buggy line of code between [BUGGYLINE] and [/BUGGYLINE] tags if exists.
